title: Jia Mo - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Arranged Marriage   Character Growth   Childhood Promise   Cold Love Interests   Demon Lord   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Demons   Fantasy Creatures   Immortals   Marriage   Mythical Beasts   Mythology   Older Love Interests   Orphans   Power Couple   Weak to Strong
author: Yang Su   杨溯
description:
The great demon Qi Yin, who later conquered the world in every direction, destroying heaven and earth, at this moment was just a bastard child whom nobody loved.

When he squatted like a wild dog under the eaves of his aunt’s house, he met the legendary vicious demon sovereign.

“My didi is here. I’ve come to find him and take him home.”

“For you, not only heaven and earth, I’ll also destroy myself.”>
